name: Magic Storm
description:
Magic Storm This is a small prototype of Vampire Survivor adding player triggered magic.

I played Vampire Survivor recently and fell in love with the gameplay. 

 So I'm looking to create my version of the game. 

 In this prototype we have the basic movements, respawn of enemies and the test of some abilities. 

 Before the beta I still want to develop the following skills: 

  • Critical Damage; 
  • Movement speed; 
  • Recover life;

I also need to develop the skill level progression system. 

 I will also add all the graphic part of the game, with VFX and post processing. Initially the style of the arts must be in Pixel Art

The leveling system is not ready yet. In the end you will have a limited number (Maybe 5?) of powers that will evolve according to your decisions.

Commands:

W, A, S, D or Arrows Keys: Movement;

E, R, F, G and left mouse: Powers;
